channel.title: Anyone doing flash/homebrew games?
channel.description:
Then post them in this thread
I've been working on music, sound effects and graphics (lol) for a DS snake clone with some stuff like powerups and chip music. i'll just leave the link here:
[url='https://staff.emuboards.com/5nake/']https://staff.emuboards.com/5nake/[/url]
feel free to check it out :slight_smile:
we're also looking for a pixelartist for upcoming games.

item.title: Anyone doing flash/homebrew games?
item.dc:creator: Kepler
item.description:
you’re always welcome to do boring tilework for us ;D
